sentences.en: Compare spray, shower, spatter, splatter, splash and slosh.
sentences.cn: 试比较spray 、 shower 、 spatter 、 splatter 、 splash、slosh的 用法.

sentences.en: Gently turn the fish, being careful not to spatter any hot butter on yourself.
sentences.cn: 轻轻地把鱼翻过来，小心别把滚烫的黄油溅到自己身上。

sentences.en: He stared at the rain spattering on the glass.
sentences.cn: 他注视着往玻璃上溅落的雨。

sentences.en: Her feet sent back a continual spatter of mud.
sentences.cn: 她的后脚不断溅起泥浆.

sentences.en: I always spatter my blouse with gravy when I eat.
sentences.cn: 吃饭的时候，我总是把肉汁溅到衬衣上。

sentences.en: IGBT power modules, 18 KHZ inverter frequency, fast response time , high arc stability, almost spatter - free welding.
sentences.cn: 采用IGBT模块, 逆变频率达18KHZ,动态响应速度快 、 稳定性能好 、 焊接飞溅极小.

sentences.en: It gets nice and cool after a spatter of rain.
sentences.cn: 下了一阵雨,天气凉快多了.

sentences.en: It has a low welding spatter and aesthetic formation of weld.
sentences.cn: 堆焊过程飞溅小,焊缝成型美观.

sentences.en: It may seize up and spatter and generally be disagreeable.
sentences.cn: 糖浆会结块并且飞溅起来,这通常让人恼火.

sentences.en: Method of decreasing spatter of short - circuit transfer welding.
sentences.cn: 减少短路过渡焊接飞溅的方法.

sentences.en: Outside magnetic field control to spatter of CO 2 arc welding.
sentences.cn: 外加磁场对CO_2焊飞溅的控制机理.

sentences.en: Spatter model of CO _ 2 arc welding based on partial least - square regression method.
sentences.cn: 基于偏最小二乘回归方法的CO_2焊飞溅模型.

sentences.en: Stable arc, less spatter and deep penetrationcan ensure welding quality well.
sentences.cn: 电弧稳定, 飞溅较少和熔透深,可确保焊接质量良好.

sentences.en: This generosity brought a spatter of applause from the boys.
sentences.cn: 这样的慷慨大度引起了孩子们的一阵喝彩之声.

sentences.en: Traces of high - velocity blood spatter on this chair.
sentences.cn: 根据就是这个椅子上有飞溅开来的血迹.

sentences.en: When he finished his recitation, there was a spatter of applause.
sentences.cn: 他朗诵完了以后, 有阵稀稀落落的掌声.

words.tran_cn: 分散；喷溅物；点燃导火线
吐痰；吐出；啐唾沫；用炙叉叉住（spit的ing形式）
吐痰；吐口水；发出劈啪声

trans.tran_en: if a liquid spatters, or if something spatters it, drops of it fall or are thrown all over a surface
